column5: Hi All,  Went out this morning locally for trout. Did not take the snowmachine or shelter because its been +4 degrees C and raining for the last 4 days....crazy! Figured the lake was gonna be knee deep slush, and was right, good day not to try and haul the shack with the heavy as a hog 600 triple! would definitely have got bogged down in the slush....so went old skool today with my trusty plastic sled and elbow grease     WENT OLD SKOOL TODAY  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/oldscool.flv">     Pretty slow start...not much for 1/2 hour....plenty of little guys showing on the sonar...no takers. Then it got busy........     PLENTY OF SMALL ONES TODAY  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/trout.flv">      Was only out for 2 hours, caught around six.....2 keepers.....rest went back. It was one heck of a  mile walk out....knee deep snow all the way.....with 8" of slush underneath that.....but i was rewarded with supper....no complaints!      YUM!
nice report good to see you got some excerise in the snow and slush  cheers!
Great report.  Just being out there is worth the effort.

Nasty out there???? I'm thinkin' the same thing and prob won't go out this weekend as it's gonna be a MESS!!!! Good to see ya put in the effort though, its always rewarding when you have to struggle a bit to get them.
Glad to see the ice is strong and you had some good action out there.
Nice report Simon!!...at least ya got out and caught some trout   ......sure is a pretty pink sled ya got there

Great report, pics and videos Simon  Old school yeah.... but at least you have some luxury in a mini sled to haul your stuff around.... for us, no such thing buddy, we must carry everything  Good job Simon, you did go out and you did catch supper.... congratulations Nice looking lakers Thanks for sharing Jacques
Sure is....thinkin of pimpin' that ride too
Well done hot stepper!!  cheers HD

i think to "pimp" it out your gonna need the following! pink streamers from a girls bike handle bars a puprle horn a barbie dolls head for a hood ornament and some pop up headlights!  great report, love the vids all the time makes the report that much better and  so does the non stop fish ya catch and your driving a popcorn machine? a 600 triple? please dont say its an Xtra Lettuce and Tomato. i just call them popcorn machines cuz  they sound the same over time. POP! POP! POP! hahahah  Matt!
Nice to see you got out simon, some good trout there for sure.  We're a little colder up here and our slush from the warm days  has started to firm up.  Today wasn't too bad out there, slush wise.
Great report and pics Simon!!!  You worked hard for those fish!!!
nice lakers Simon glad you got some action hope slush firms up for this weekend
HOLY....talk about character assination....lol....it is an XLT.

sorry simon, was not supposed to be like that, as i'm sure you know,    had too many problems with the XLT and so have 2 of my friends!  keep them reports comin my friend love seeing them and love seeing a limeyangler topic  come up!  cheers, Matt!
Hey Matt....not even a problem, i thought your observations were funny    and i wish i had gone for something other than the triple...too late now
